sourcesContent:
import Footer from "../../components/footer/footer.component"; import Slide from 'react-reveal/Slide'; const LeadGenerator = () => { return (

Lead Generator Responsibilities

As a lead generator, you are one of the backbone that supports the company into getting the right targeted audience to avail for our services. Alongside a digital marketer, the duties of a lead generator includes supervising and analyzing these digital channels:

  • Social Media Platforms such as Facebook, Tiktok, Twitter etc.
  • Company websites.
  • Search Engines such as Google, Yahoo, Bing etc.
  • Mobile apps such as Whatsapp, Instagram, etc.
  • Blogs
  • Online ads
  • Email advertisements/marketing

With a digital marketer, a lead generator uses the different social media platforms to apply lead generation strategies to gather prospects and widening our services' reach. The core responsibilities and duties that a lead generator should possess are as follows:

  • Managing group members and posting announcements to them.
  • Generate leads to qualify and enroll them to any platforms that has exclusive training support programs
  • Managing consultants and control sales efforts for the entire organization
  • Generate leads via cold calling or emails.
  • Following up all leads.
  • Analyzing and monitoring marketing campaigns and strategies to identify opportunities to improve the output of the campaigns.
  • Analyzing and recording of services and products and then increasing the awareness through promotional events.
  • Developing, planning and executing seminars, speaking engagements or shows that will increase the awareness of the services that will broaden the target audience.
  • Developing relationships with potential and existing clients through emails and calls.
  • Providing customer service to potential clients by answering their inquiries about the products or services.
  • Generating sales leads for businesses by identifying potential clients with the use of different channels.
  • Researching target clients and customers to understand the pain points faced by the prospects or to check for competitor products used by leads.

Educational Requirements - A lead generator has at least a high school diploma or GED. Although it is recommended to have at least a bachelor’s degree in marketing, advertising or any relevant courses.

Experience Requirements - A lead generator must have at least 1 or 2 years of experience in B2B/B2C (Business-to-Business or Business-to-Consumers) sales. The company will provide training that includes the company’s softwares and guidelines that will help in the sales process and other aspects of the business.

) } export default LeadGenerator;
